message: I live for the open road and the freedom it brings. Every mile on my bike is a chance to escape the noise and find clarity. I’m not just riding—I’m living. I value authenticity, and I’m always chasing the next horizon. Life’s too short to follow the crowd. I wear my leather jacket not just for style, but as a symbol of who I am: tough, resilient, and unafraid to face the night. I’m not looking for approval—I’m building my own story, one ride at a time.
cn_prompt: 画面中的男士正站在夜晚的城市街头，一手拿着黑色摩托车头盔，另一手自然垂下，佩戴着银色项链和手表，穿着皮夹克和牛仔裤，神情专注地对着镜头讲话，偶尔用拿头盔的手做些小幅度动作匹配说话内容，镜头固定。
en_prompt: The man in the image stands on a city street at night, holding a black motorcycle helmet in one hand while the other hand hangs naturally by his side. He wears a silver necklace and a watch, dressed in a leather jacket and jeans. He speaks directly to the camera with a focused expression, occasionally making small gestures with the hand holding the helmet to match his speech. The camera remains fixed.
